column5: New ride sharing services are now in place (Fasten, Getme) offering free promotional rides, allowing for very cheap rides to downtown. Awesome location minutes from everything central and easy access to Mopac while being in the safest neighborhood in central Austin. The bus stop is right up the street and right next to a grocery store. Downtown is 5 min right up the highway.   City of Austin Licensed and Code Compliant
column8: Close to SXSW, Safe, Clean, Quiet & Free Parking
